response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am confident that this product could be a game-changer for you. Considering its worth to you and its potential impact on your business or personal life, I propose a transaction price of $1,300,000.

This offer is tailored to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring a fair return for me as the seller. I understand that you may have other considerations, so please feel free to share any concerns or counter-offers you might have. I am open to discussing different aspects of the deal to ensure that we both reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Should you decide to proceed, I am prepared to provide detailed information about the product, including its specifications, features, and any necessary documentation. I am also flexible regarding payment terms and delivery schedules to accommodate your needs.

Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
